# Autogenerated example code for cloudbilling.projects.updateBillingInfo

# PRE-REQUISITES:
# ---------------
# 1. If not already done, enable cloudbilling Api and check quota for your project at
#    https://console.developers.google.com/apis/api/cloudbilling/quotas 
# 2. Install python client library for Google APIs using 'pip install --upgrade google-api-python-client'.
# 3. This sample uses Application Default Credentials for Auth. If not already done, install gcloud CLI from 
#    https://cloud.google.com/sdk/ and run 'gcloud auth login'


from apiclient import discovery
from oauth2client.client import GoogleCredentials
import json

# Authentication is provided by gcloud tool when running locally
# and by built-in service accounts when running on GAE, GCE or GKE.
# See https://developers.google.com/identity/protocols/application-default-credentials
# for more information.
credentials = GoogleCredentials.get_application_default()

# Construct the service object for interacting with the Compute API -
# the 'cloudbilling' service, at version 'v1'.
# You can browse other available api services and versions here:
#     https://developers.google.com/api-client-library/python/apis/
service = discovery.build('cloudbilling', 'v1', credentials=credentials)

project_billing_info = {}  # construct your object here
request = service.projects().updateBillingInfo(body=project_billing_info, name="projects/example-project")
request.execute()
